forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 55F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending in the afternoon. High 56F. SE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 5C. NNW winds shifting to E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. NNW winds shifting to ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
